info.description:
# Create External Conversation
This app allows you to create new conversations on external Nextcloud Talk servers.
## Features
- Create conversations on external Nextcloud Talk servers - Automatically invite selected users from the external server - Add yourself via federation to join the conversation - Admin settings to configure external server credentials - Integration with Nextcloud Talk
## Configuration
1. Go to Admin Settings â†’ External Conversation 2. Configure the external server URL 3. Add authentication credentials (username and password)
## Usage
Once configured, users can create conversations on the external server by providing a conversation name and selecting a user to invite.
